Uses of Interface
com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.DropZone

  • Packages that use DropZone 
    Package Description
    com.github.bordertech.wcomponents
    Contains the core components of the WComponent framework.

    • Uses of DropZone in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents

      Classes in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents that implement DropZone 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  WAjaxPollingRegion
      Deprecated. 
      1.2.0 This component is too abstract which leads to severe accessibility issues under common conditions and should have been an implementation example. See https://github.com/BorderTech/wcomponents/wiki/WAjaxPollingRegion.
      class  WApplication
      This component must be used as the top level component for an application.
      class  WFieldSet
      WFieldSet is used to logically group together input fields.
      class  WMessages
      WMessages provides a convenient wrapper for the WMessageBox and WValidationErrors components, and lets the developer use a "singleton" WMessages instance per application.
      class  WPanel
      A WPanel is used to group components together.
      class  WSection
      The WSection component defines a major discrete section of a screen which is associated with, and described by, a heading.
      Methods in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents that return DropZone 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DropZone WMultiFileWidget.getDropzone()
      Return the dropzone associated with this file input.
      Methods in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents with parameters of type DropZone 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void WMultiFileWidget.setDropzone(DropZone dropzone)
      Register a component to receive drag and dropped files on behalf of this input.
